betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I have to say, this is almost disappointing...
The powers of the Temporal Fractallite have taken me away from the conflict of Terra for years, and yet nothing changed? The stalemate with the Twilight Horde has not evolved one bit?
I cannot believe it!
Well, I should probably be happy, all things considered. No change is better than change for the worst.
And here is a small tidbit of info. For the first time since the start of my campaign, I heard the term "Shyrelands". I assume it must refer to the inner, more powerful worlds of the Empire, since I had not yeat encountered the word. As a matter of fact, I have gone so far, and yet been completely ignorant of the term "Shyre". What does it mean? Is it a place?
